Biore Clean Detox Gentle Cleanser

Brand: Bioré

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: WATER, GLYCERIN, COCO-GLUCOSIDE, COCAMIDOPROPYL BETAINE, HYDROXYPROPYL STARCH PHOSPHATE, ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN, ACRYLATES/C10-30 ALKYL ACRYLATE CROSSPOLYMER, PEG-40 HYDROGENATED CASTOR OIL, LACTIC ACID, HYDROXYACETOPHENONE, SODIUM HYDROXIDE, TETRASODIUM GLUTAMATE DIACETATE, PROPYLENE GLYCOL, CAMELLIA SINENSIS LEAF EXTRACT, SODIUM

ACRYLATE CROSSPOLYMER, PEG-40 HYDROGENATED CASTOR OIL, LACTIC ACID, HYDROXYACETOPHENONE, SODIUM HYDROXIDE, TETRASODIUM GLUTAMATE DIACETATE, PROPYLENE GLYCOL, CAMELLIA SINENSIS LEAF EXTRACT, SODIUM BENZOATE.
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
